CustomField.formula: "http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chtt=Task+Time+Budget+Analysis&"& "chxr=0,0," & Text(max( MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget__c,MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget_from_Milestones__c,MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Estimate__c, MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Incurred__c)) & "&" & "chxt=y&chbh=a&chs=300x225&cht=bvg&"& "chco=2299bb,eeaa66,ee3322,666666&"& "chdl="& "Budget (" & TEXT(MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget__c) & ")"& "|Planned (" & TEXT(MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget_from_Milestones__c) & ")"& "|Estimated (" & TEXT(MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Estimate__c) & ")"& "|Incurred (" & TEXT(MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Incurred__c) & ")"& "&chd=t:"& TEXT( MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget__c / max( MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget__c,MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget_from_Milestones__c,MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Estimate__c, MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Incurred__c) * 100 )&"|"& TEXT( MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget_from_Milestones__c / max( MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget__c,MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget_from_Milestones__c,MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Estimate__c, MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Incurred__c) * 100) &"|" & TEXT( MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Estimate__c / max( MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget__c,MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget_from_Milestones__c,MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Estimate__c, MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Incurred__c) * 100 ) &"|" & TEXT( MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Incurred__c / max( MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget__c,MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Budget_from_Milestones__c,MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Estimate__c, MPM4_BASE__Total_Hours_Incurred__c) * 100)
CustomField.label: Hours Summary - Deprecated
